languages.text: На лице сержанта Вигастиса появился румянец, и раны уже явно не так сильно его тяготят. Со своим видавшим виды лазружьем он расставаться, судя по всему, отказался.
Sergeant Vigastes's face appears flushed, and his wounds clearly burden him less now. It seems he refused to part with his battered lasgun.
languages.original_text: На лице сержанта Вигастиса появился румянец, и раны уже явно не так сильно его тяготят. Со своим видавшим виды лазружьем он расставаться, судя по всему, отказался.

traits.locale_text: A blush has appeared on Sergeant Vigastes's face, and his wounds clearly do not burden him much now. Apparently, he refused to part with his battered lasgun.
A blush has appeared on Sergeant Vigastes's face, and his wounds clearly do not burden him much now. Apparently, he refused to part with his battered lasgun.
Sergeant Vigastes's face appears flushed, and his wounds clearly burden him less now. It seems he refused to part with his battered lasgun.
Sergeant Vigastes's face appears flushed, and his wounds clearly burden him less now. It seems he refused to part with his battered lasgun.
Sergeant Vigastes's face appears flushed, and his wounds clearly burden him less now. It seems he refused to part with his battered lasgun.

languages.text: 维加斯特军士的连看起来红扑扑的。很显然，他的伤势已经不再像之前那样折磨他了。看来，他并没有遗弃他那把破烂不堪的激光枪。
languages.original_text: Sergeant Vigastes's face appears flushed, and his wounds clearly burden him less now. It seems he refused to part with his battered lasgun.

traits.locale_text: 维加斯特军士的连看起来红扑扑的。很显然，他的伤势已经不再像之前那样折磨他了。看来，他并没有遗弃他那把破烂不堪的激光枪。

languages.text: Le visage du sergent Vigaste a retrouvé ses couleurs et ses blessures le font clairement moins souffrir qu'avant. Il semble avoir refusé de se séparer de son fusil laser usé.
languages.original_text: Sergeant Vigastes's face appears flushed, and his wounds clearly burden him less now. It seems he refused to part with his battered lasgun.

traits.locale_text: Le visage du sergent Vigaste a retrouvé ses couleurs et ses blessures le font clairement moins souffrir qu'avant. Il semble avoir refusé de se séparer de son fusil laser usé.

languages.text: ヴィガステス軍曹の顔は赤みがさして見え、もう傷の方はだいぶ良いようだ。使い古したラスガンは手放したくなかったらしい。
languages.original_text: Sergeant Vigastes's face appears flushed, and his wounds clearly burden him less now. It seems he refused to part with his battered lasgun.

traits.locale_text: ヴィガステス軍曹の顔は赤みがさして見え、もう傷の方はだいぶ良いようだ。使い古したラスガンは手放したくなかったらしい。

languages.text: La cara del sargento Vigastes está sonrojada y sus heridas ya no le afectan tanto. Parece que se niega a separarse de su maltrecho rifle láser.
languages.original_text: Sergeant Vigastes's face appears flushed, and his wounds clearly burden him less now. It seems he refused to part with his battered lasgun.

traits.locale_text: La cara del sargento Vigastes está sonrojada y sus heridas ya no le afectan tanto. Parece que se niega a separarse de su maltrecho rifle láser.

languages.text: Sergeant Vigastes Gesicht hat Farbe angenommen, und seine Wunden belasten ihn inzwischen offenbar deutlich weniger. Er scheint sich geweigert zu haben, sein altes Lasergewehr abzugeben.
languages.original_text: Sergeant Vigastes's face appears flushed, and his wounds clearly burden him less now. It seems he refused to part with his battered lasgun.

traits.locale_text: Sergeant Vigastes Gesicht hat Farbe angenommen, und seine Wunden belasten ihn inzwischen offenbar deutlich weniger. Er scheint sich geweigert zu haben, sein altes Lasergewehr abzugeben.

languages.text: Çavuş Vigastes'in yüzü, eski rengine kavuşmuş. Yaralarının da eskisinden çok canını yaktığı belli. Iskartaya çıkmış silazerinden ayrılmayı kabul etmemişe benziyor.
languages.original_text: Sergeant Vigastes's face appears flushed, and his wounds clearly burden him less now. It seems he refused to part with his battered lasgun.
